text_block_list.text: While many spectators expected Biwa Hayahide's victory—
Many fans passionately supported Matikanetannhauser, calling her the 'Ordinary Representative' and being moved and encouraged by her.
Meanwhile, in the underground passage, Biwa Hayahide and Tokai Teio exchange handshakes, and—
Unlike the Classic Year Umas watching from the side, Matikanetannhauser walks right down the center, puffing out her chest as if to say, 'I'm here too!'
With Nice Nature joining in, the four praise each other's efforts. And finally—the curtain rises on the year-end grand showdown, the 'Arima Kinen'!
